title: Trust in Health Care Under Pressure
itunes:title: Trust in Health Care Under Pressure
description:
Edelman CEO Richard Edelman discusses the findings of the global communication firm's Trust Barometer report “Trust in Healthcare.”

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
